description: Poached eggs are simple but delicious and there's no need for a complicated method to get a perfectly runny centre.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg,Peanut free
name: Poached Eggs On Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to the boil, add the vinegar and reduce to a simmer, gently bubbling. Crack an egg into a small cup or bowl and carefully drop into the pan. Repeat with the rest of the eggs.
Poach for 2-3 minutes, remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.
Toast the bread to your liking, spread with butter and serve with eggs sprinkled with salt and pepper.
